cast.name: 奇拉·塔希米克 Kidlat Tahimik

director.name: 奇拉·塔希米克 Kidlat Tahimik

this_title: Ang Lakaran ni Kabunyan: Kabunyan's Journey to Liwanag
introduction: Upon his departure from his home in Baguio, the road trip of the director's youngest son, Kabunyan, begins. He stops at certain places along the way, engaging in conversation with various companions - often artists - in between drives.
chinese_title: Ang Lakaran ni Kabunyan: Kabunyan's Journey to Liwanag
